name: Shootout Squares
description:
Shootout Squares is a simple multiplayer 2D game with two squares shooting in the other with points count. Made with Godot Engine 3.0.5.

Keys:

Player 1:

W = Up, S = Down, Space = Fire

Player 2:

Up, Down, 0 NumPad = Fire

Github Project: https://github.com/leotada/Shootout-Squares
